Select Your BINGO Numbers
1. Pick 5 Numbers for each letter. 
2. Place them in any order under the correct letter
3. Confirm all spaces are filled.
4. Submit Issue

B | I | N | G | O
------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------| 
__ | __ | __ | __ | __
__ | __ | __ | __ | __
__ | __ | X | __ | __
__ | __ | __ | __ | __
__ | __ | __ | __ | __


>"B" (numbers 1–15)

>"I" (numbers 16–30) 

>"N" (numbers 31–45) 

>"G" (numbers 46–60) 

>"O" (numbers 61–75)
